text: Guy Delcourt (13 July 1947 - 31 January 2020) was a French politician, a member of the National Assembly. He represented the Pas-de-Calais department, and was a member of the Socialist Party and of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche parliamentary group. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Palaiseau Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Mayors of places in Hauts-de-France Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Guy Delcourt (politician)
